definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: He hit his head as he stood up and cursed loudly.
sentences.chinese: 他站起来时撞了头，便破口大骂。

sentences.english: All he saw honor send home namely faces, unknown so honor.
sentences.chinese: 全见荣送玥回家即破口大骂，荣不明所以。

sentences.english: The driver was slanging a pedestrian who had got in his way.
sentences.chinese: 那司机破口大骂挡他的路的行人。

sentences.english: I can catch the last shout abuse, or knees to detain him.
sentences.chinese: 我可以追过去破口大骂，或者双膝跪地挽留他。

sentences.english: She shouted abuse without any restraint.
Li Qiang's in the mind denounces aboveboard, on the mouth but guest the respectful spirit ground say.
sentences.chinese: 李强心里破口大骂，嘴上却客客气气地说道。

definition: to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
stamp with fury/fly into a rage
to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
to stomp or hop about (in anxiety, anger etc)/to dance on one's feet/hopping mad (anxious, etc)
unable to restrain one's anger (idiom); in a towering rage
to berate/to excoriate/to chide/also written 喝斥[he1 chi4]
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
